@hulu_support I eventually used Chrome Developer Tools to clear things and hard reset your site. You've got some kind of bug in your authentication process but this is probably an edge case. I'd much rather learn how to recover my viewing history.

@LEGOMastersFOX @hulu This was a tough call.  They decided to award the technical double loop but the lady bug coaster was the one constantly featured in all the outros and ad breaks.  Aesthetics do matter!

So 6+ years. Tons of ppl in @Hulu communities still complaining about shows restarting instead of resuming. I finally understand why. This is a feature, not a bug. They make us rewatch ads to boost ad revenue. That’s why they’ve never had a fix for this. Admit it guys.

@hulu_support Restarting the app fixes the problem. But are you suggesting that it’s -expected- that your app is so buggy users have to restart the app continually in order to work around bugs? If I buy something that doesn’t work, I get refunds. Will I get a refund?

@hulu fix your bugs!!! my email and password are correct and still I can't loggin getting the exact same message over and over. Hire some backend people and fix your bugs once and for all, we pay for a service, so provide the service already.
@Rodney_Huff @DisneyPlus @hbomax @hulu @AppleTV @netflix I mean I'd take fewer bugs / better functionality over consistency if I have to pick, but certainly both would be nice.
